items.text: first ball that Williams gets on his bat. Solid defence, as you would expect at 6 for 2
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Williams, no run

items.text: a bit of movement away, and Williams gets the inside of the bat on to his pad. Close!
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Williams, no run

items.preText: James: "I don't think Bangladesh will start favourites but nor did Pakistan in the Champions Trophy. There will undoubtedly be a "surprise" team, but England (at home) and India will probably start favourites." - Well said.
items.text: left alone again, as the ball swings away from outside off
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Williams, no run

items.text: way outside off stump and Williams squeezes it away. Point saves it from going outside the inner ring, but cannot prevent the first run in 23 balls
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Williams, 1 run

items.text: played away to the on side, but for no runs. Another tidy over that keeps Zimbabwe in check
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, no run

items.text: strays down the leg side, and Zhuwao gets it away for four. Plays it one-handed virtually
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, FOUR runs

items.text: decent shape back in to Williams. Plays it away to the on side
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.preText: Reid: "Zimbabwe looks defeated since the first over! They have players like taylor and Raza. Masakadza whose been playing since the start of time.. yet they don't have the self belief! Hope they will get over their inner turmoil and at least look more motivated "
items.text: outside off, and defended to the cover fielder
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: terrific push away to the off side. Didn't look to hit it too hard, and placed it nicely between cover and point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, 2 runs

items.text: that was quick, and cutting across Williams. Did well to jab his bat down on time
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: driven down the ground, just past Saifuddin's left leg. Exquisite timing there from Williams, who is looking good so far
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, FOUR runs

items.text: opens the face of the bat and gets it through the infield. Two runs comfortably for Taylor
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, 2 runs

items.text: defended outside off
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, no run

items.preText: "Chittagong has been renamed as the "Chattogram" by the government of Bangladesh. It's my home district (commercial capital too). So, which name do you prefer to continue with?" - Well, Anam, Chattogram is perfectly fine. My grandfather grew up near Comilla, by the way.
items.text: defended outside off stump. The bowler has come around the wicket now
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, no run

items.text: lofted over mid-on, and one bounce into the fence. Suggests that this is a good batting track and Zimbabwe should aim to set the foundation for a biggish score
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: back to over the wicket, and just angling across Taylor, who covers it comfortably with a forward defensive shot
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, no run

items.text: that was played on to the pads and popped up. A game effort from Hider at getting to it, but just cannot latch on.
items.postText: Here's Hemant now for the next phase of play
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, a bit of room outside off, goes for the cut but hits it straight to the man at cover-point
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: fuller on stumps, pushed towards covers
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: pitched up once again, presents the full face of the bat to work it towards mid-off
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: length outside off, comes forward and defends
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: driven this time, comes forward and dispatches it through the covers for four
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, 2 runs

items.text: pitched up once more, lunges forward and defends
items.shortText: Mohammad Saifuddin to Williams, no run

items.text: a low full toss outside off, Taylor mistimes the drive towards mid-off
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, no run

items.text: bouncer this time, Taylor waits for it to come, sways back at the very last moment to ramp it over the keeper, great improvisation
items.shortText: Abu Hider to Taylor, FOUR runs
